title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2010)
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Children - Family relationships
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Australia
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family - Asia, Southeastern
abstract: Four stories from the general public as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop held at ACMI in March 2010.
description: These four personal narratives cover vastly different lives but the prevailing theme is of family and the parental figure that inspires and protects. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
